dict.acceptation: 顾客；当事人；诉讼委托人；[计算机]客户端；

sent.orig: As a consultant the word client is synonymous with the word customer.
sent.trans: 在“顾问”这个方面，client和customer（顾客）是同义词。

sent.orig: Client understands and acknowledges that Client can not be considered the client of any other IB.
sent.trans: 客户了解并确认客户不得被视为任何其它介绍经纪人的客户。

sent.orig: Place hand that is farther from client under client's shoulders, supporting his head and cervical vertebrae.
sent.trans: 将一手（离病人稍远的手）放于病人肩下，支撑病人头部和颈椎。

sent.orig: A network file transfer process, including client and client services.
sent.trans: 网络文件传输过程中，包括客户端和客户服务。

sent.orig: A satisfied Zeritsky client was a silent client.
sent.trans: 一个满意的择瑞特斯盖顾客是一个沉默的顾客。
